title: index_alias_impl.go:408 nil pointer dereference
body:
While doing a search with IndexAliases, looks like one (or maybe all?) of the underlying index implementations returned an error back up to the index alias impl during MultiSearch() and the index alias codepath didn't handle the error correctly...
